name: Divinity: Dragon Commander

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  appid: 243950
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Divinity - Dragon Commander/Shipping/DragonCommander.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx11_42
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx11_43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: msxml3
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: physx
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xinput
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
